scan_script_only_check.description: The Zero Trust- Policy Based Session Access plugin enables security admins to reduce user access in a session based on parameters such as IP address, location, identify provider attributes, and user attributes with adaptive authentication policies. When this plugin is enabled and the system property "glide.authenticate.session_access.mobile.enabled" set to "true", users authenticating through a mobile device will have their roles restricted according to the plugin's policies. Instance admins may wish to restrict high privileged access when users authenticate through a mobile device as it could indicate an unsafe environment for sensitive operations.
scan_script_only_check.name: Policy Based Session Access for Mobile Devices is not enabled
scan_script_only_check.resolution_details: Ensure the property "glide.authenticate.session_access.mobile.enabled" is set to "true"
scan_script_only_check.short_description: Policy Based Session Access for Mobile Devices is not enabled
scan_script_only_check.sys_name: Policy Based Session Access for Mobile Devices is not enabled
